description: Lightweight and versatile for comfortable everyday wear, the Grünten is nevertheless a hard-wearing boot suitable for intensive outdoor use. Its mid-cut double-stitched leather upper and soft cuff provide good freedom of movement plus protection for the ankle. With a sure-grip Hanwag IceGrip ZT profile to prevent slipping on hard, icy surfaces. And should it ever wear out, it can be easily resoled.
name: HanWag Grunten Winter - Mens

specs.value: sustainable, durable, high-quality, handcrafted workmanship and fully resoleable
